ch.nolix.element.option

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.element.basic.Element
      • ch.nolix.element.option.Option
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IControlleroid, DeterminedSIMPLE_CLASS_NAMEd, Specifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CursorIcon, DataSIMPLE_CLASS_NAME, FrameLayout, GridLinesSIMPLE_CLASS_NAME, HorizontalStackLayout, RectangleState, TableLinesSIMPLE_CLASS_NAME, VerticalStackLayout

    public abstract class Option
extends Element
    An option is an instance that indicates one well-defined state from a set of selectable states.
